meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tuneful.
meanings.sent1: Her singing had a lovely tunefulness that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The tunefulness of the birdsong filled the forest with joy.
meanings.sent3: The tunefulness of the cat's meow was surprisingly delightful.
meanings.sent4: The tunefulness of the wind chimes danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The tunefulness of the piano keys resonated through the room.

meanings.definition: The pleasing sound of a melody or musical composition.
meanings.sent1: The tunefulness of the guitar solo brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The tunefulness of the symphony captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The tunefulness of the alarm clock woke him up with a jolt.
meanings.sent4: The tunefulness of the rain on the roof was a lullaby to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The tunefulness of the choir echoed beautifully in the church.
